joint_movement.py

1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import sys
4 import rospy
5 from std_msgs.msg import Bool, Int16
6 
7 import rospkg
8 import os
9 import numpy as np
10 
11 from PandaController import PandaController
12 from SawyerController import SawyerController
13 
14 
15 class ActivityMatrixController():
16  def __init__(self, controller, desired_positions_path, is_sim=True):
17  """
18  Panda Trajectory control class for sending
19  JointTrajectory messages to the real Franka Panda,
20  or the simulated Panda.
21 
22 
23  Parameters
24  --------------
25  `is_sim`: `bool`: If we are working with the real or simulated Panda
26 
27  """
28 
29  # get the controller, either sawyer or panda
30  self.controller = controller
31 
32  self.joint_dof_pub = rospy.Publisher(
33  '/joint_mvmt_dof', Int16, queue_size=1)
34  self.calibration_pub = rospy.Publisher(
35  '/calibration_complete', Bool, queue_size=1)
36  # rospy.init_node('calibration_joint_mvmt_node', anonymous=True)
37  self.pos_mat = np.loadtxt(desired_positions_path)
38  print(self.pos_mat)
39 
40  def spin(self):
41  """
42  Goes through all of the joints and positions.
43 
44  Arguments
45  ---------
46  None
47 
48  Returns
49  ----------
50  returns: None
51  """
52  joint_int = 0
53  self.controller.send_once()
54  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
55  # Increment the Dof we are actuating here
56  # Check if we have actuated every DoF, to end this script
57 
58  # go through every pose
59  print(joint_int)
60  if joint_int == 7:
61  self.calibration_pub.publish(True)
62  print('CALIBRATION COMPLETE')
63  break
64  # Publish this message so activation_matrix.py
65  # knows which Dof what actuated
66  self.joint_dof_pub.publish(joint_int)
67  rospy.sleep(1)
68 
69  # publish message to actuate the dof
70  self.controller.publish_positions(self.pos_mat[joint_int*2], 2)
71  rospy.sleep(5)
72  # publish -1 so nothing is put into activity matrix
73  self.joint_dof_pub.publish(-1)
74  # bring back to home position before next pose
75  self.controller.publish_positions(self.pos_mat[(joint_int*2)+1], 2)
76 
77  joint_int += 1
78 
79 
80 if __name__ == '__main__':
81  arg = sys.argv[1]
82  filename = sys.argv[2]
83  robot_type = sys.argv[3]
84  is_sim = True if arg == 'true' else False
85 
86  if robot_type == 'sawyer' and is_sim is False:
87  raise Exception('Real Sawyer support is currently not supported.')
88  # controller was determined from roslaunch file.
89  controller = PandaController(is_sim=is_sim) if robot_type == 'panda' \
90  else SawyerController()
91  rospack = rospkg.RosPack()
92  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospack.get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
93  desired_positions_path = os.path.join(
94  ros_robotic_skin_path, 'data', filename)
95  try:
96  activity_matrix_control = \
97  ActivityMatrixController(controller, desired_positions_path,
98  is_sim=is_sim)
99  activity_matrix_control.spin()
100 
101  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
102  print('Exiting Franka Panda control process...')
